title: Raivien
author: Raivien
content: HiI own a project in the Forex niche, we are looking at best way to advertise a free offer alongside our discord.I'm open to all ideas, whether it be mass dm's, shilling on twitter/discord/telegram etc, If you have the ability or a service which offers advertising in groups which would suit a FOREX niche please message me or message on Telegram @VCAK_UK

Royse777 2. Little mouse 3. Worldofcoins 4. Perhaps for the participants, the signature campaign is the most profitable, but it should not be limited that it is the peak of the advertising.
